Today

June 2023

Mon 26
June 26 - July 1

Mastery Week: New Frontiers of the Enneagram with Russ Hudson & Nicole Seawell

Modern Elder Academy Baja, Mexico

June 26, 2023 through July 1, 2023
Aging is a journey of evolution and transition. For every page we turn, ahead of us lie new, unexplored chapters filled with discovery and adventure as well as assumptions about ourselves to challenge – all which lead to new frontiers of possibility. Come join me for an exclusive, weeklong workshop, Mastery Week: New Frontiers of the Enneagram, June 26 - July 1 at Modern Elder Academy’s magical Baja, Mexico beachfront campus.

More Information

July 2023

Thu 20
July 20 - July 23

Russ Hudson & Catherine Bell | The Creative Mindstream – IEA Global Conference 2023

Parc 55 Hotel 55 Cyril Magnin Street, San Francisco, CA, United States

July 20, 2023 through July 23, 2023
Join the global Enneagram community in San Francisco, California, this July for IEA’s Global Conference: Unite & Ignite!  The conference, to be held July 21-23,  will be hosted at the beautiful Parc 55 Hotel, centrally located to all that San Francisco has to offer as a vibrant and diverse city.  The Pre-Conference on July 20 is sure to set the stage for a brilliant and engaging gathering for all!
